metadata.title: CVE-2018-19870 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. A malformed GIF image causes aNULL pointer dereference in QGifHandler resulting in a segmentation fault.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19870` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5core5a - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5dbus5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5gui5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5network5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5opengl5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-ibase - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5test5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5widgets5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
libqt5xml5 - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
qt5-default - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
qt5-gtk-platformtheme - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
qt5-qmake - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
qt5-qmake-bin - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
qtbase5-examples - 5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.9.5+dfsg-0ubuntu2.1').
